game_graphics

Class AnimatedSprite2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • game_graphics.Sprite2D
      • game_graphics.AnimatedSprite2D

  • public class AnimatedSprite2D
extends Sprite2D
    This class extend Sprite2D class and represent 2D animation.Using this class is very simple. User only need select sprite sheet and set some parameters and animation will work.
    Author:
    Comexetina

                        int y,
                        int col,
                        int rows,
                        int width,
                        int height,
                        int frameCount)
        Class constructor
        Parameters:
        path - path the path of sprite sheet
        x - x the upper left x coordinate of Sprite2D
        y - y the upper left x coordinate of Sprite2D
        col - Number of columns in sprite sheet
        rows - Number of rows in sprite sheet
        width - frame width
        height - frame width
        frameCount - number of frames
